text:
@realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods Commutation for Stone??Judge Sullivan said about Michael Flynn that he arguably "sold out his country?"

Same for Stone. 

As if you haven't done enough to ensure that you won't be re-elected.

Worry about those infected with COVID-19 rather than a convicted felon.

Shameful.
